author: djrtwo
content:
Thanks <@!573787335796326400> and <@!612786210829631525> for sprinting ahead on the v0.10.1 BLS test vectors and reporting an issue with a few of them! Because this was a very isolated problem with the test generators, we've merged the fix into master and re-run the test generators _without_ cutting a new spec or test repo release.

I think 95%+ of you pull down `tar.gz`  test files so I've updated `general.tar.gz` with the fixed vectors in the `v0.10.1` release.

https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-spec-tests/releases/tag/v0.10.1
